About.content:
Hi,

I am passionate about using analytics and AI to unlock insights from complex datasets. With over 12 years of experience (in data analysis and software development), I specialize in creating and optimizing practical solutions for real-world problems.

Additionally, I bring a strong academic background (PhD) and enjoy contributing to the design and delivery of training programs to share knowledge with others.

content.institution: International Institute of Information Technology Bangalore

content.title: Senior Software Developer
content.description: Contributed in curating an ETL pipeline (Python) for clients to model their existing data into graph database for analytics.

content.title: Senior Research Associate (PostDoc)
content.description: Built effective solutions to analyze complex datasets, e.g., for cooperative AI behavior analysis in multi-agent scenarios. Led and collaborated on 8 multidisciplinary projects, proposing advanced techniques for analyzing AI behavior, temporal group memberships, and text cohesion in technical writing.

content.title: Research Associate (PhD)
content.description: Led 9 multidisciplinary projects, developing advanced techniques for visualizing complex datasets, diagnosing AI behavior, interactive labeling, and exploring knowledge graphs.

content.title: Software Engineer
content.company: Graphics Visualization Computing Lab at IIITB
content.description: Developed advanced visualizations and user interfaces to analyze complex datasets, including network logs for security incidents, oceanographic data anomalies, and multilayer network patterns. Leveraged technologies such as D3.js, Python, C++, and Qt to create efficient, interactive tools that improved data interpretation and significantly reduced customer effort in building complex test cases.

content.title: Systems Engineer
content.description: Automated the account opening application process of a bank using Java and IBM Websphere, and developed a Java script for error log compilation and pattern recognition.

content.title: NeurIPS 2020's Flatland competition
content.description: First prize for developing innovative visual analytics solution to understand multi-agent AI cooperative behaviors in a rail-based simulation.

content.title: Best Paper Award
content.description: Recognized for novel visualization for dynamic overlapping sets at VMV conference 2020.

content.title: NeurIPS 2019's Pommerman competition
content.description: Community award (first prize) for analyzing group dynamics (competitive and cooperative behavior) in trained AI agents.

content.outro: Whether you have a question about my research, want to collaborate on a project, or just want to say hello, Let's get in touch!

Publications.content: Explore the collection of my publications. From groundbreaking research to practical applications, they reflect my passion for unraveling complex datasets, visual analytics, and advancing AI understanding.
